scripts.cy:smoke: cypress run --browser chrome -e TAGS="@smoke and not @development and not @noprod"
scripts.cy:regression: cypress run --browser chrome -e TAGS="@regression and not @development"
scripts.cy:electron:smoke: cypress run --browser electron -e TAGS="@smoke and not @development and not @noprod"
scripts.cy:electron:regression: cypress run --browser electron -e TAGS="@regression and not @development"
